issue.title: bitcoin.service issue for a noob like me
issue.body:
### Motivation

Hi i don't know if i'm in the right section but i have a problem installing contrib/init/bitcoind.service. i'm a noob so please if someone can help me. I downloaded bitcoin core full node and Tor. Now i installed the service to start bitcoin core on boot of my machine that is Linux Mint on an old macbook pro.
When i make sudo systemctl start bitcoind show like this
![Schermata del 2024-10-02 19-15-59](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b781e7c5-9a29-440e-9492-03cf329e3543)
but when i reboot the system don't start automatically and show this:
![Schermata del 2024-10-02 19-18-17](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/685b279b-0732-454d-9ff1-820b1321847b)
if i do journalctl -e give me this
![Schermata del 2024-10-02 19-22-00](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c8bc770e-a4fa-4bb6-8f17-0f2b685c6667)
the service file is this:
![Schermata del 2024-10-02 19-24-18](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a44d461c-ba51-4535-9d84-5de3348fcfb7)
![Schermata del 2024-10-02 19-24-55](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b6bf3964-961c-4628-84b2-7a761845da99)
![Schermata del 2024-10-02 19-25-22](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/195d8548-7d34-4372-942a-c7aa763a5b42)

Thank you in advance to whom can help me.



### Possible solution

_No response_

### Useful Skills

* Compiling Bitcoin Core from source
* Running the C++ unit tests and the Python functional tests
* ...
